title: "You have disconneted" despite having internet connection
body: As the title says, I can watch Youtube, write this thread. Champion select is normal, but at the loading screen/ champion screen I will load to like 50% and then the message "You have disconneted, please check your connection" pops up. I can close the client and reconnect, but only when the game has started, otherwise the message will pop up again and again. This has been the case since patch 7.14. Really annoying

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having some problems getting connected to our game servers while the other players are trying to connect. It may have something to do with how your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) are currently configured, so let's make sure to start troubleshooting by double checking the steps in that guide.
